programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: Gerry, a former United Nations employee, unexpectedly finds himself in a race against time as he investigates a threatening virus that turns humans into zombies.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Aboard an international flight, when a terror attack threatens to transpire, havoc wreaks on the plane. The cabin crew must strive to save their passengers and themselves.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: A Chinese special forces unit must rescue their fellow citizens in the country of Yewaire on the Arabian Peninsula amidst violent coup and threats from a terrorist group.

programme.title: Sword Master
programme.desc: A master swordsman is haunted by his greatest skill and simply wishes to live in peace. However, a rival who aims to take his place at all costs forces him to wield his weapon once again.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: An enchantress, disguised as an old beggar, curses a selfish prince to live as a beast. To break her spell, he must learn to love and be loved before the last petal of the rose falls.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Clark learns about the source of his abilities and his real home when he enters a Kryptonian ship in the Artic. However, an old enemy follows him to Earth in search of a codex and brings destruction.
